income_messages:
From: j*****o@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-10 13:08:03
SUBJECT:   Dear sir,
  Dear sir,
I am resending this message to you for the last time because you might think it's one of those junk mails without knowing it's what will benefit you.
This message I am resending to you kindly give it a deep thought before responding back to me and note this process cost money but the only good thing about the process  it's doesn't cost much and you pay once not like other government officials that demands payment after payment.
I am Engr.Jide Jalowo.I have just resumed in Central Bank Of Nigeria (CBN) remittance department here as the Senior Engineer in charge of CBN computer/Control Room.
During a recent close study of information in our Central Computer Hard Disc,I discovered a floating amount  which represent your overdue payment But no one is opting to receive these funds or asking about it with keen interest but it was later i find out that some officials  wanted to divert your fund That was why i take this opportunity to ask why you have abandoned this payment and to know if you would need my assistance in any way to remit part of the money to you.
Your payment must have passed through all normal Central Bank Of Nigeria Payment procedures to get to the remittance department, meaning that there is no major reason for further delay in transferring your funds. Hence, I know that you may be faced with the problem of "whom do you know"?
I know I can help you by gradual remittance process of about $150,000.00 to $300,000.00 in each transaction with a "Proxy Disk".But it has to be kept confidential because this is a  personal
 arrangement and nobody knows it except me and i will do it perfectly and you will receive your fund once you promise to keep it confidential!Let me know what you think about this.I will need a scan copy of your international passport or national id card/ drivers license, any of this three is accepted.
As I have stated above that this payment process cost money if you know your not ready to comply kindly don't reply because I will not respond to you.
Please re/confirm your account detail to avoid making  transfer to wrong account.
Remain Bless,
 Engr.Jide Jalowo   
From: j*****o@gmail.com
To: ot71106@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-10 16:28:52
SUBJECT: Re: Dear sir,
Attn:Mr.Jeffrey,
Thank you for accepting my proposal to remit your funds  gradually with the
Proxy Disc and please bear with me for this long reply which will give you
full understanding.
First of all there is no single risk involved because the transaction is
strictly between me and you and you are not going to sabotage me because I
am asssting you to release your overdue long awaited so you have to protect
my interest by keeping it to yourself alone.I don't know if you have
Bitcoin wallet address which I think is the best and safest/ fastest to
receive your payment without any delay or hitch.
This is a direct remittance into your account, which will not pass through
any body or office and do not forget that 100 people can fail you but only
one person will succeed you.
That is life for you and of course the law of success.  Anyway, let me
explain the process of Proxy Disk to you so that you will understand
exactly what I intend to do for you. Proxy Disk is an instrument used in
our Apex Bank (CBN) during remittance exercise.
I will use this type of instrument to remit your funds gradually to you. I
can remit about $150,000.00 to $300,000.00  in each round of remittance as
I stated in my first email! Please note that this is not the same process
with usual CENTRAL BANK  (CBN) transfer that takes months and years,
without achieving success.
This is a practical process which has been tested and proven, and will be
witnessed only by both of us. It takes just few hours to give good result!
There are no documents or certificates required for this because I will
process a direct remittance into your account.
All I need is to get the Proxy Disk and program your Payment Pin Code into
it by running it in our Central Computer Hard Disk.
 I will also program your account details to the receiving end of the Disk
and slot it into the Central Computer System. I will allow it to run
overnight in that position and the result is that an amount not less than
$150,000.00 to $300,000.00  will be remitted into your account the
following morning. This is a practical process, which is known to me alone
as a computer specialist (guru)!  The only thing You have to do for me is
to send money to purchase the small size of the instrument (Proxy Disk),
which will conveniently remit up to  $150,000.00 to $300,000.00  Later we
can buy the bigger size to continue but I want us to get some money into
your account first. It is better than wasting time and money to process the
release of your entire amount without achieving success.  There would
always be one thing or the other missing if you want to receive your entire
payment and CBN will hold unto that to delay or cancel your payment. Proxy
Disk is the only thing we need to buy in this process which will not cost
much.  The instruments is on different capacity and process depending the
one you can afford.
1,The capacity of the instruction that can remit $150,000.00 to $300,000.00
cost $6,850.00
2,The one that can remit $1,000,000.00 to $2,000,000.00 cost $12,730.00
3,Then from $2,000,000 to $5,000,000.00 and above cost $25,700.00.
I also want to do this hoping that you will appreciate my help. Please note
that your payment is long overdue and if left for longer time, bad CBN and
other government officials will conspire to divert it for their selfish
interest! It is very urgent you respond to me I will be waiting for your
urgent response!
Best regards,
Engr.Jide Jalowo
From: j*****o@gmail.com

Time: 2023-04-10 16:40:36
SUBJECT: My passport/Id Attached
Sir call me or you send me your number.

From: j*****o@gmail.com

Time: 2023-04-10 19:15:06
SUBJECT: Re: Dear sir,
Dear Jeffrey,
I will forward you an appriciation message
I received from a customer I assisted.
I am not suppose to forward it as it's confidential and I know you will
keep the secret let it not look as if I am exposing him
From: j*****o@gmail.com
To: ot71106@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-10 19:18:25
SUBJECT: Fwd: From Mr.Abdul/My ID attached
---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: *Abdulrahman Ebrahim Alkhalifa* <abdulrahmanebrahima796@gmail.com>
Date: Tuesday, Jenuary 11, 2022
Subject: Fwd: Attn:Mr.Abdul/My ID attached
To: jjalowo@gmail.com
Assalamualaikum,
Engr.Jide Jalowo my brother,my heart is full of joy .Insha Allah I will
always love you and your entire family.you have truly proved to me that you
are  a man of your word and very honest man.iniately I never believed you
because i have lost so much money in the past,but when I went back to your
message I told myself let me give it my last trial if it fails I will take
it as one of those things one should experience in life but to my greatest
surprise you use this instrument to release my long awaited funds for over
20 years to me with any problem.
I will invite you and your family to Bahrain kingdom ok.
Once again I thank you so much.
Shaikh Abdul Rahman Ebrahim Alkhalifa
